overview:
Roger Jowett is Chief Operating Officer - Australia for Signature Security Group. He joined Signature in December 2007. Roger has held various leadership positions in major fire and security businesses in the UK and Continental Europe. He came to Australia in 2003 to head up a leading electronic security business. Roger has significant market development and acquisition experience; he has driven business growth and profit improvement through the execution of Service Excellence programs and post-acquisition integration.

Roger has over 18 years of fire and security industry experience. He has held committee positions on Trade Associations in the UK and France and represented the UK on Eurofeu Standards meetings. Roger has a BA Honours Degree, Marketing Diploma and is an MBA graduate of Henley Management College.
